name: John Elwood BUCKNER, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
John Elwood BUCKNER, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Justice SOTOMAYOR, dissenting from the denial of certiorari: I dissent from the denial of certiorari for the reasons set out in Brown v. United States , 586 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 14, --- L.E.2d ---- (2018) ( Sotomayor, J., dissenting).
casebody.head_matter:
John Elwood BUCKNER, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 17-9411.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 15, 2018.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
Justice SOTOMAYOR, dissenting from the denial of certiorari: I dissent from the denial of certiorari for the reasons set out in Brown v. United States , 586 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 14, --- L.E.2d ---- (2018) ( Sotomayor, J., dissenting).
